modName: WSBP - Windsong Skyrim Beauty Project V1
summary: This mod is made and based on Vanilla and its purpose is to give more realistic and beautiful grapic enhancements on every characters in the game.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/6460-1-1352055578.png[/img][/center]


[center][size=+5][b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26404/]WSBP v2 LINK[/url][/b][/size][/center]





[center][size=+1][b]This mode doesn\'t change all Skyrim\'s people like to Legolas. Those are just well made example.
So, it means blacksmith is still blacksmith and old man is still old man. Don\'t worry about it :)[/b][/size][/center]





[img]http://static.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/images/6460-1-1326873406.png[/img]
First of all I worship beauty. I\'m sure everyone feels the same :) 
However, thinking like this doesn\'t mean that Skyrim should have Japanese style  atmosphere.

Let\'s make an assumption that when you start the game, the first person you meet will be a Nord man muttering on the carriage.
In fact, he looks quite charming. Let\'s greet him with a warm smile. After reaching a small village, you get off from the carriage.
Then you\'ll see two people standing infront of you, a red guard millitary woman (the evil one) and a dependable soldier.  

Then suddenly, WTH!!!!!? It\'s been only 5 minutes since we started but that monstrous witch wants me dead.
What kind of nation gives death penalty without even a trial? My hands are perfectly clean! I don\'t deserve this! 
Speaking of which, why am I in the execution ground in the first place? Who the hell am I really?
Let\'s refresh our memory. Remember now? Then gently turn off the game and let\'s have a serious discussion about Skyrim.

None of us wish for neither [color=#00b0a2]Legolas[/color] nor [color=#ef007c]Snow White[/color] in Skyrim. It\'s not that we want an actual hero to appear on the screen. 
We just want to look at our character\'s pure, charming faces.

Have a look at Skyrim\'s avatars, all skin and bones, covered with wrinkles and dirts. 
The Imperials must be collecting taxes from Skyrim\'s rivers. Severe Imperial :\'(
Even though Skyrim\'s historical background is based on ancient societies, it seems rather harsh. 

The character Legolas from the movie \'Lord of the ring\' is a superb example of what people of Skyrim should be.
He maintains his cleanliness even he gets in the same messy situation when Aragon\'s cloth gets so filthy. Â 




[center][color=#ffaa00][b]Experienced disappointment only after playing 5 minutes? Then this mode is FOR YOU :)[/b][/color][/center]



[center]The textures of male and female were created based on the faces of Hollywood actors.[/center]

[center][color=#00b0a2][b]Male[/b][/color] - [b]Jonathan Rhys Meyes[/b] from the movie \'August Rush\'[/center]
[center][color=#ef007c][b]Female[/b][/color] - [b]Amber Heard[/b] from the movie \'Never Back Down\' Luv you Amber[/center]





[center][img]http://static.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/images/6066-1-1326465001.jpg[/img][/center]





[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/6460-1-1347422151.png[/img]
This mod is made and based on Vanilla and its purpose is to give more realistic and beautiful on every characters in the game. 
Replaces all races\' (except Kajjit and Argonian) [color=#00b0a2][b]Textures[/b][/color] and [color=#ef007c][b]Normal map.[/b][/color] Unfortunately, due to the lack of official CS tool ,
you cannot mix this mode with any other face or body modes.

1) [color=#ffaa00][b]Wrinkle[/b][/color]       -   By removing almost every wrinkles on the characters make them look much younger like their 20th.
2) [color=#ffaa00][b]Box[/b][/color]           -   Removing boxes from every faces and bodies on the characters, both male and female.
3) [color=#ffaa00][b]Face[/b][/color]          -   Adding partial lighting effects and making eyes and lips more clearer gives you more chance to create wonderful characters.
                    Improving the cheeks on the characters and changing shapes on the characters of certain races(-Orc, Highelf, Darkelf, Woodelf-).
4) [color=#ffaa00][b]Body[/b][/color]          -   By making body texture associate with face texture naturally lead characters look much more realistic and natural.
5) [color=#ffaa00][b]Elf[/b][/color]           -   Ugly monster looking Elves are fixed to more human looking, both male and female.
6) [color=#ffaa00][b]Underwear[/b][/color]     -   Changed Vanilla Skyrim\'s underwears to brow fabric and attached animal fur.
7) [color=#ffaa00][b]Option Part[/b][/color]   -   \"Smooth skin\" file changes Breton and Imperial race(only men)s\' skin look more clean and smooth.





[img]http://static.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/images/6460-3-1326873407.png[/img]
Basically, This mod [color=#ffaa00][b]does not ovelapped[/b][/color] with other similar body or face mods.

1) First Delete all files following path - Data/textures/Actors/Character
In case, if you are using Hair, eye, lips mods that would be fine. 
2) Highly suggest you downloading with Internet [color=#00b0a2][b]explorer9[/b][/color] or [color=#ef007c][b]Google Chrome[/b][/color].
3) There is no compatiblity with pther node body or glomour body mods except CBBE.
4) Compressed by 7zip. Simply extract this file into skyrim main folder.
5) This may cause CTD, body transparency, melanism depending on your computer.
   If so, like oblivion, after this patching, you must run  [color=#ffaa00][b]archive invalidation[/b][/color] with NMM.
   As you know, there was a mod called auto archive invalidation in oblivion.





[img]http://static.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/images/6460-4-1326873407.png[/img]
[color=#ffaa00][b]Data - Textures - Actors - Character[/b][/color]
(Delete all the following files insede the folder) 
 
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\bretonfemale\\femalehead_msn.dds
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\darkelffemale\\femalehead_msn.dds
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\female\\femalehead_msn.dds
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\female\\astridhead_msn
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\femaleold\\femalehead_msn.dds
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\femaleorc\\femalehead_msn.dds
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\highelffemale\\femalehead_msn.dds
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\imperialfemale\\femalehead_msn.dds
Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\redguardfemale\\femalehead_msn.dds





[img]http://static.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/images/6460-5-1326873407.png[/img]
[11-12-30] v1.1 Released
[12-01-05] v1.2 Released
[12-01-21] V1.3 Released
